flavorText:
It is best to conquer dragons before they hatch.
—Femeref adage

foreignData.flavorText: Drachen bekämpft man am Besten, bevor sie schlüpfen. —Sprichwort der Femeref
foreignData.name: Sog aus der Ewigkeit
foreignData.text: Lege eine aufgedeckte Karte deiner Wahl, die ganz aus dem Spiel entfernt ist, auf den Friedhof ihres Besitzers.

foreignData.flavorText: Es mejor lidiar con los dragones antes de que nazcan. —Adagio femeref
foreignData.name: Extraer de la eternidad
foreignData.text: Pon la carta boca arriba objetivo que está removida del juego en el cementerio de su propietario.

foreignData.flavorText: Il vaut toujours mieux vaincre les dragons avant qu'ils n'éclosent. —Adage fémeiref
foreignData.name: Extraction de l'éternité
foreignData.text: Mettez la carte face visible ciblée qui est retirée de la partie dans le cimetière de son propriétaire.

foreignData.flavorText: È meglio sgominare i draghi prima che nascano. —adagio Femeref
foreignData.name: Richiamo dall'Eternità
foreignData.text: Metti una carta rimossa dal gioco a faccia in su bersaglio nel cimitero del suo proprietario.

foreignData.flavorText: ドラゴンは孵る前に倒せ。 ――フェメレフの諺
foreignData.name: 永遠からの引き抜き
foreignData.text: ゲームから取り除かれている表向きのカード１枚を対象とし、それをオーナーの墓地に置く。

foreignData.flavorText: É melhor conquistar os dragões antes que comecem a chocar. —Provérbio de Femeref
foreignData.name: Arrancar da Eternidade
foreignData.text: Coloque o card alvo com a face voltada para cima que foi removido do jogo no cemitério de seu dono.

foreignData.flavorText: «Лучше захватить драконов перед тем как они вылупятся», Фемерефская поговорка
foreignData.name: Возврат из Вечности
foreignData.text: Положите целевую карту, которая удалена из игры, лицом вверх на кладбище владельца.

foreignData.flavorText: 想赢过龙，最好是在他们孵出来之前。 ～费米瑞甫格言
foreignData.name: 拽入来世
foreignData.text: 将目标牌面朝上、且被移出对战的牌置入其拥有者的坟墓场。

name: Pull from Eternity
originalText: Put target face-up card that's removed from the game into its owner's graveyard.

rulings.text: Pull from Eternity targets a card in the exile zone. A card is only face down in the exile zone if the effect that put it there specifically says so.
If Pull from Eternity affects a suspended card, the card loses its time counters and is no longer suspended. (This doesn’t trigger the last ability of suspend.)
If Pull from Eternity affects a card that’s haunting a creature, the haunt effect ends.

text: Put target face-up exiled card into its owner's graveyard.
